name: squares-attacks
description:
2d retro 800x600 game.

Control by WASD and Mouse. Target and Shot.

The bullets rebonds and can hurt you. Each rebond give more energy to bullet.

Made by using pygame

Attributions:

== sounds & sfx ==

artisticdude - https://opengameart.org/content/fire-evil-spell

subspaceAudio - https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Interface Sounds (1.0) - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/interface-sounds

Sci-Fi Sounds (1.0) - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/sci-fi-sounds

== graphics ==

Chris Hamons (maintainer) (Submitted by MedicineStorm) - https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles

font-pack Zingot Games http://www.zingot.com https://opengameart.org/content/bitmap-font-pack
